author: fapeeler
msg: additional information in error msg, reduced the amount of email notifications when an error is detected.

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-3024: Routes added from JAXB need to be prepared before being add to CamelContext. camel-spring etc. does custom preparation.

author: hwright
msg: When requesting file contents from an Item, return them as a file-like object.
This allows us to use this object as input other methods which expect file-like
